Class SimpleGameBoard

    public class SimpleGameBoard
extends AbstractGameBoard
    Represents the standard game board

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleGameBoard

        public SimpleGameBoard(int size)
        Creates a two dimensional array of blank Tiles, as well as creating goal nodes. It does this by going through each Tile of boardState and initially sets this Tile's color to blank.
        Parameters:
        size -

      • getNeighbors

        public java.util.Set<Tile> getNeighbors(Tile tile)
        Returns a Set of the Tile neighboring the specific Tile. The set should have a size of no fewer than 4 and no more than 6.
        Parameters:
        tile -
        Returns:
        Set
